column26: The presence of an entry sign of a town or village is often accompanied with a speed limit, normally the generally valid speed limit of 50km/h sign no. 2.30.1.Switzerland:(main roads)(minor roads)Liechtenstein:(main roads)(minor roads)

Switzerland:The name above the horizontal line is the name of the next village or town (not the name of the current place!), the name(s) below the line mention the next major settlement(s), and optionally, the distance to them.(main roads)(minor roads)Liechtenstein:(main roads)(minor roads)
